constituent: failure, shellfish, clam, oyster, eye, animal legs, eight, taskmaster
heisigStory: The taskmaster is acknowledging the failure of a clam to make the grade in some marine school or other.
koohiiStory1: If you end up in failure, you give money to the taskmaster to train you.
koohiiStory2: The shell who was defeated before (defeat (#63)) is being chastised by the taskmaster for his failure to win.
myStory: sai lầm. thất bại. đánh vỏ xò là sai lầm
